events.name: Accusation and trial of British mercenaries by DPR
events.wd_label: Accusation and trial of British mercenaries by DPR
events.wd_description: The Russian-backed Donetsk People’s Republic (DPR) accused two more British citizens, Dylan Healy and Andrew Hill, of being mercenaries, initiating an inquiry against them.
events.description: The Russian-backed Donetsk People’s Republic (DPR) accused two more British citizens, Dylan Healy and Andrew Hill, of being mercenaries, initiating an inquiry against them.

events.name: British mercenaries accusation
events.wd_description: Dylan Healy and Andrew Hill were accused by the DPR of being mercenaries, similar to three previously convicted mercenaries.
events.description: Dylan Healy and Andrew Hill were accused by the DPR of being mercenaries, similar to three previously convicted mercenaries.

events.name: UK Foreign Office response
events.wd_description: The UK Foreign Office criticized the political exploitation of inmates and highlighted the issue with Russian authorities, supporting Ukraine's efforts to free them.
events.description: The UK Foreign Office criticized the political exploitation of inmates and highlighted the issue with Russian authorities, supporting Ukraine's efforts to free them.

events.name: European Court of Human Rights intervention
events.wd_label: European Court of Human Rights intervention
events.wd_description: The European Court of Human Rights granted interim measures to prevent the execution of the previously convicted mercenaries.
events.description: The European Court of Human Rights granted interim measures to prevent the execution of the previously convicted mercenaries.

events.name: Ranil Wickremesinghe elected President of Sri Lanka
events.wd_label: Ranil Wickremesinghe elected President of Sri Lanka
events.wd_description: Former Sri Lanka Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe was elected President by lawmakers amid ongoing protests demanding his removal due to his association with former President Gotabaya Rajapaksa.
events.description: Former Sri Lanka Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe was elected President by lawmakers amid ongoing protests demanding his removal due to his association with former President Gotabaya Rajapaksa.

events.name: election of Wickremesinghe
events.wd_description: Ranil Wickremesinghe, a six-time former prime minister and ally of Gotabaya Rajapaksa, was elected President of Sri Lanka by lawmakers, receiving 134 out of 223 votes.
events.description: Ranil Wickremesinghe, a six-time former prime minister and ally of Gotabaya Rajapaksa, was elected President of Sri Lanka by lawmakers, receiving 134 out of 223 votes.

events.name: Wickremesinghe's address
events.wd_description: After being elected, Wickremesinghe addressed the country, emphasizing the need for unity and cooperation despite the division along party lines.
events.description: After being elected, Wickremesinghe addressed the country, emphasizing the need for unity and cooperation despite the division along party lines.

events.name: protest against Wickremesinghe
events.wd_description: A small group of protesters gathered at the president's residence to protest Wickremesinghe's nomination during the voting process.
events.description: A small group of protesters gathered at the president's residence to protest Wickremesinghe's nomination during the voting process.

events.name: Ukrainian authorities find 440 unmarked graves in Izium
events.wd_label: Ukrainian authorities find 440 unmarked graves in Izium
events.wd_description: Ukrainian authorities discovered 440 unmarked graves at a burial site in Izium, a city recently recaptured from Russian forces, and announced plans to show the site to Ukrainian and international journalists.
events.description: Ukrainian authorities discovered 440 unmarked graves at a burial site in Izium, a city recently recaptured from Russian forces, and announced plans to show the site to Ukrainian and international journalists.

events.name: discovery of graves
events.wd_description: Ukrainian authorities found 440 unmarked graves at a burial site in Izium, a city in eastern Ukraine recently recaptured from Russian forces.
events.description: Ukrainian authorities found 440 unmarked graves at a burial site in Izium, a city in eastern Ukraine recently recaptured from Russian forces.

events.name: Zelensky's statement
events.wd_description: President Volodymyr Zelensky stated that Ukrainian and international journalists would be shown the burial site to reveal what the Russian occupation led to.
events.description: President Volodymyr Zelensky stated that Ukrainian and international journalists would be shown the burial site to reveal what the Russian occupation led to.

events.name: Center for Strategic Communications statement
events.wd_description: The Center for Strategic Communications in Ukraine reported that some of the discovered graves were fresh, and that civilians constituted the highest number of those buried.
events.description: The Center for Strategic Communications in Ukraine reported that some of the discovered graves were fresh, and that civilians constituted the highest number of those buried.

events.name: context of Izium's occupation
events.wd_description: Izium, subjected to intense artillery attacks from Russia in April, became a crucial hub for the invading military during five months of occupation.
events.description: Izium, subjected to intense artillery attacks from Russia in April, became a crucial hub for the invading military during five months of occupation.

events.name: Investments and Developments in EV Battery Supply Chain
events.wd_label: Investments and Developments in EV Battery Supply Chain
events.wd_description: Electric vehicle makers are investing in supplier deals and production plans to address the increasing demand for EV batteries and the constraints in the supply and processing of essential minerals.
events.description: Electric vehicle makers are investing in supplier deals and production plans to address the increasing demand for EV batteries and the constraints in the supply and processing of essential minerals.

events.name: Facility Investments
events.wd_description: Automakers are investing in their own battery production facilities in the U.S. to shorten supply chains and qualify for the Biden administration’s tax credits.
events.description: Automakers are investing in their own battery production facilities in the U.S. to shorten supply chains and qualify for the Biden administration’s tax credits.

events.name: t: Toyota Investment
events.wd_description: Toyota announced a $2.5 billion investment in its North Carolina battery production facility, which will supply batteries for hybrid EVs and battery electric vehicles beginning in 2025.
events.description: Toyota announced a $2.5 billion investment in its North Carolina battery production facility, which will supply batteries for hybrid EVs and battery electric vehicles beginning in 2025.

events.name: t: Panasonic Investment
events.wd_description: Panasonic is investing nearly $10 billion to establish two battery production facilities in the U.S., with a $4 billion facility in Kansas and another site in Oklahoma.
events.description: Panasonic is investing nearly $10 billion to establish two battery production facilities in the U.S., with a $4 billion facility in Kansas and another site in Oklahoma.

events.name: Expanded Sourcing
events.wd_description: Ford and GM have announced new battery supplier agreements to expand their sourcing pools and meet production goals.
events.description: Ford and GM have announced new battery supplier agreements to expand their sourcing pools and meet production goals.

events.name: t: Ford Supplier Agreements
events.wd_description: Ford has deals with suppliers around the globe to bring in additional lithium, graphite, cobalt, and nickel stock.
events.description: Ford has deals with suppliers around the globe to bring in additional lithium, graphite, cobalt, and nickel stock.

events.name: t: GM Supplier Agreements
events.wd_description: GM struck multiple deals, including a six-year agreement with LG Chem to explore building a cathode active material plant in North America by 2025.
events.description: GM struck multiple deals, including a six-year agreement with LG Chem to explore building a cathode active material plant in North America by 2025.

events.name: Supplier Acquisitions and Joint Ventures
events.wd_description: Automakers are forming joint ventures and acquiring supplier companies to enhance their control over the battery supply chain.
events.description: Automakers are forming joint ventures and acquiring supplier companies to enhance their control over the battery supply chain.

events.name: t: Nikola Acquisition
events.wd_description: Nikola announced it would acquire energy storage technology company Romeo Power to bring battery pack production in-house.
events.description: Nikola announced it would acquire energy storage technology company Romeo Power to bring battery pack production in-house.

events.name: t: Honda Joint Venture
events.wd_description: Honda formed a joint venture with South Korea-based LG Energy Solutions to produce lithium-ion batteries for the North American market, with a $4.4 billion investment in a JV battery plant in the U.S.
events.description: Honda formed a joint venture with South Korea-based LG Energy Solutions to produce lithium-ion batteries for the North American market, with a $4.4 billion investment in a JV battery plant in the U.S.

events.name: Government Supply Agreements
events.wd_description: Automakers are striking deals with governments to boost opportunities for suppliers and secure raw materials.
events.description: Automakers are striking deals with governments to boost opportunities for suppliers and secure raw materials.

events.name: t: Volkswagen-Canada Agreement
events.wd_description: Volkswagen signed an agreement with the Canadian government to secure supplies of lithium, cobalt, and other raw materials.
events.description: Volkswagen signed an agreement with the Canadian government to secure supplies of lithium, cobalt, and other raw materials.

events.name: t: Mercedes-Benz-Canada Agreement
events.wd_description: Mercedes-Benz signed an agreement with the Canadian government to explore mining, refining, and cell manufacturing opportunities in Canada.
events.description: Mercedes-Benz signed an agreement with the Canadian government to explore mining, refining, and cell manufacturing opportunities in Canada.
